lines.text: How's the coffee, Dakota? Is it strong enough?
Drop a rock in it! If it don't sink, it's strong enough.
I've never seen anybody take to anything the way you have a gun. A man would think you've been shooting all your life.
It's just like anything else. Decide where you want to go, then get there the best way you can.
[Sam Bass and friends have just held up a stagecoach and removed only part of the money from the strong box]
Well, we could've had our ranch out of that box.
No, we couldn't, Joel. The way we did it, even if this thing comes out, people will know that we took back only what he stole from us. They'll be on our side.
Sure, we wouldn't want 'em to think we robbed this stage dishonestly.
